statements: SELECT * FROM parent_contact_info;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parent_contact_info;
SELECT parent_email, parent_phone_number FROM parent_contact_info;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name FROM parent_contact_info ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_contact_info WHERE parent_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parent_contact_info WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM parent_contact_info ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone_number FROM parent_contact_info WHERE parent_id > 3 ORDER BY parent_name ASC;
SELECT parent_email FROM parent_contact_info WHERE parent_name LIKE '%John%' AND parent_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT parent_name FROM parent_contact_info ORDER BY parent_name ASC, parent_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_contact_info;
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone FROM parent_contact_info;
SELECT child_name, child_dob, child_email FROM child_contact_info;
SELECT parent_id, parent_phone, parent_email FROM parent_contact_info ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT child_name, child_email FROM child_contact_info WHERE child_dob > '2010-01-01';
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, parent_email FROM parent_contact_info ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT child_name, child_dob, child_phone FROM child_contact_info WHERE child_dob >= '2010-01-01' ORDER BY child_name ASC;
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone, child_name FROM parent_contact_info JOIN child_contact_info ON parent_contact_info.parent_id = child_contact_info.parent_id WHERE parent_id = 3;
SELECT parent_name, child_name FROM parent_contact_info JOIN child_contact_info ON parent_contact_info.parent_id = child_contact_info.parent_id WHERE parent_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS child_count FROM child_contact_info;
SELECT * FROM parent_contacts;
SELECT parent_name, phone_number FROM parent_contacts;
SELECT parent_name, email_address FROM parent_contacts WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, child_name, relationship FROM parent_contacts JOIN child_contacts ON parent_contacts.parent_id = child_contacts.parent_id;
SELECT log_date, log_time, log_description FROM communication_logs;
SELECT * FROM parent_contacts WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, email_address FROM parent_contacts WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT child_name, relationship FROM child_contacts ORDER BY child_name DESC;
SELECT log_description, log_date, log_time FROM communication_logs WHERE parent_id = 2 AND child_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date ASC, log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Parent ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM Parent WHERE parent_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT child_name, child_birthdate FROM Child WHERE child_birthdate > '2005-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, start_date, end_date FROM Custody_Schedule WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT parent_name, child_name, log_date, log_description FROM Parent JOIN Communication_Log ON Parent.parent_id = Communication_Log.parent_id ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Parent;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM Parent WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT child_name, child_birthdate FROM Child ORDER BY child_birthdate DESC;
SELECT c.child_name, p.parent_name FROM Child c INNER JOIN Parent p ON c.parent_id = p.parent_id;
SELECT log_date, log_description FROM Communication_Log WHERE parent_id = 2 AND child_id = 1 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM parents;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parents ORDER BY parent_name ASC;
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone FROM parents WHERE parent_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, parent_phone FROM parents WHERE parent_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM children WHERE child_age > 10 ORDER BY child_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM parents WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email, parent_phone FROM parents WHERE parent_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT child_name, child_age FROM children WHERE child_age > 5 ORDER BY child_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM custody_cases WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT doc_name, doc_type FROM documents WHERE case_id = 3 ORDER BY doc_name DESC;
